mapper.select: SELECT ITEM.ITEM_NO, ITEM.ITEM_NAME, ITEM.ITEM_SHORTPATH, ITEM.ITEM_PRICE, NVL(SUM(ORDERDETAIL.ORDERITEM_COUNT),0) AS ITEM_COUNT FROM ITEM LEFT OUTER JOIN ORDERDETAIL ON ITEM.ITEM_NO = ORDERDETAIL.ITEM_NO GROUP BY ITEM.ITEM_NO, ITEM.ITEM_NAME, ITEM.ITEM_SHORTPATH, ITEM.ITEM_PRICE ORDER BY ITEM_COUNT DESC

SELECT ITEM.ITEM_NO, ITEM.ITEM_NAME, ITEM.ITEM_SHORTPATH, ITEM.ITEM_PRICE, NVL(SUM(ORDERDETAIL.ORDERITEM_COUNT),0) AS ITEM_COUNT FROM ITEM LEFT OUTER JOIN ORDERDETAIL ON ITEM.ITEM_NO = ORDERDETAIL.ITEM_NO WHERE ITEM.ITEM_GENDER=#{gender} GROUP BY ITEM.ITEM_NO, ITEM.ITEM_NAME, ITEM.ITEM_SHORTPATH, ITEM.ITEM_PRICE ORDER BY ITEM_COUNT DESC
